mapper.sql: state AS "state", qr_code_id AS "orCodeId", type AS "type", data AS "data", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from qr_code where 1 = 1
and or_code_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.orCodeId},'%')
and type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and data like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.data},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')

select
from qr_code where 1 = 1
and or_code_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.orCodeId},'%')
and type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and data like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.data},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')

select
from qr_code where 1 = 1
and or_code_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.orCodeId},'%')
and type is null
and type is not null
and type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and data like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.data},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')

select
from qr_code where 1 = 1
and or_code_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.orCodeId},'%')
and type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.type},'%')
and data like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.data},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
